sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM) – U.S. Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz picked up a key endorsement during his visit to the Midstate on Wednesday.
author: George Stockburger
title: Oz visits Harrisburg, picks up key endorsement

author: DML News App
title: REPORT: Dr. Oz longtime staffers say they were ‘blindsided’ after campaign announcement

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, the celebrity doctor running for the Republican nomination in Pennsylvania’s 2022 Senate race, claims he is “100% pro-life” but has a record indicating otherwise.
author: Breccan F. Thies
title: Dr. Oz’s Pro-Life Campaign Branding at Odds with Past Comments
